pricing.summary: Focused strategy sprint to align vision, scope, and feasibility.
Hands-on build partnership to ship AI products or data platforms.

competencies.title: Core Competencies
competencies.subtitle: What you should showcase

pillars.title: Agentic AI & Multi-Agent Systems
items: Autonomous task orchestration using LangGraph, Semantic Kernel, CrewAI, Agentcore/Strands
Agent-to-agent collaboration patterns and enterprise workflows

pillars.title: Generative AI Product Engineering
items: Real-time AI applications with streaming UX
Prompt systems, guardrails, evaluation, and production tuning

pillars.title: Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG)
items: Knowledge-base grounded assistants using Bedrock KBs, S3 document stores
Hybrid structured + unstructured retrieval for accuracy and cost control

pillars.title: Cloud-Native AI Platforms (AWS + Azure + GCP Ready)
items: Scalable deployments using Lambda, Step Functions, API Gateway, Docker, CI/CD
Secure AI infrastructure with IAM, Cognito, monitoring, parameter stores

pillars.title: Data Engineering for AI Readiness
items: Data pipelines across Redshift, PostgreSQL, DynamoDB
Schema design, transformation workflows, analytics integration

pillars.title: AI Automation & Intelligent Document Systems
items: Semantic indexing for finance, tax, enterprise document intelligence

pillars.title: Full Stack AI Delivery
items: Next.js + Angular frontends for AI apps
Backend runtimes with FastAPI, .NET Core, Node.js
